Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed black; single added white band above lotus bud in white outline with added red centre; exterior: reserved save for one wide band; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: 'List 36' is written in pencil on a label glued to the exterior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1569) (phase 2)
